languages.text: "Про брата-эконома Нигмуса можно сказать немногое. Он не стяжал славы в битвах и не знаменит проповедями, но под его надзором монастырь никогда ни в чем не нуждался. Он в высшей степени разумен и кроток".

"Few things can be said about the oikonomos Nigmus. He has never been famous for his prowess in battle or his sermons, but the monastery has never wanted for anything on his watch. He is a most reasonable and unobtrusive individual."
languages.original_text: "Про брата-эконома Нигмуса можно сказать немногое. Он не стяжал славы в битвах и не знаменит проповедями, но под его надзором монастырь никогда ни в чем не нуждался. Он в высшей степени разумен и кроток".

traits.locale_text: "Few things can be said about the oikonomos Nigmus. He has never been famous for his prowess in battle or his sermons, but the monastery has never wanted for anything on his watch. He is a most reasonable and unobtrusive individual."

"Few things can be said about the oikonomos Nigmus. He has never been famous for his prowess in battle or his sermons, but the monastery has never wanted for anything on his watch. He is a most reasonable and unobtrusive individual."

languages.text: «No hay mucho que decir sobre el oikonomos Nigmus. Nunca ha destacado por sus proezas en combate ni por sus sermones, pero al monasterio nunca le ha faltado de nada. Es un individuo razonable y nada propenso a entrometerse».
languages.original_text: "Few things can be said about the oikonomos Nigmus. He has never been famous for his prowess in battle or his sermons, but the monastery has never wanted for anything on his watch. He is a most reasonable and unobtrusive individual."

traits.locale_text: «No hay mucho que decir sobre el oikonomos Nigmus. Nunca ha destacado por sus proezas en combate ni por sus sermones, pero al monasterio nunca le ha faltado de nada. Es un individuo razonable y nada propenso a entrometerse».

languages.text: « On peut dire que l'oïkonomos Nigmus passe relativement inaperçu. Il ne s'est jamais distingué par ses prouesses martiales ou la puissance de ses sermons, mais le monastère n'a jamais manqué de rien sous sa supervision. C'est un individu discret et raisonnable. »
languages.original_text: "Few things can be said about the oikonomos Nigmus. He has never been famous for his prowess in battle or his sermons, but the monastery has never wanted for anything on his watch. He is a most reasonable and unobtrusive individual."

traits.locale_text: « On peut dire que l'oïkonomos Nigmus passe relativement inaperçu. Il ne s'est jamais distingué par ses prouesses martiales ou la puissance de ses sermons, mais le monastère n'a jamais manqué de rien sous sa supervision. C'est un individu discret et raisonnable. »

languages.text: “尼格穆斯大总管就没什么可说的了。他没有赫赫战功，也不以布道闻名，但在他的管理下，修道院自给自足，从未发生过物资匮乏的情况。他为人十分通情达理，也不爱出风头。”
languages.original_text: "Few things can be said about the oikonomos Nigmus. He has never been famous for his prowess in battle or his sermons, but the monastery has never wanted for anything on his watch. He is a most reasonable and unobtrusive individual."

traits.locale_text: “尼格穆斯大总管就没什么可说的了。他没有赫赫战功，也不以布道闻名，但在他的管理下，修道院自给自足，从未发生过物资匮乏的情况。他为人十分通情达理，也不爱出风头。”

languages.text: 「オイコノモス・ニグマスについて言えることはほとんどありません。彼は戦場での能力や説教で有名になったことはありませんが、彼の監視下で修道院が困ったことは一度もありません。最も合理的かつ目立たない人物です」
languages.original_text: "Few things can be said about the oikonomos Nigmus. He has never been famous for his prowess in battle or his sermons, but the monastery has never wanted for anything on his watch. He is a most reasonable and unobtrusive individual."

traits.locale_text: 「オイコノモス・ニグマスについて言えることはほとんどありません。彼は戦場での能力や説教で有名になったことはありませんが、彼の監視下で修道院が困ったことは一度もありません。最も合理的かつ目立たない人物です」

languages.text: "Über den Oikonomos Nigmus lässt sich nur wenig sagen. Er war nie für seine Kampfkraft oder für seine Predigten bekannt, doch es hat dem Kloster unter seiner Führung auch nie an irgendetwas gefehlt. Er ist ein äußerst vernünftiger und unaufdringlicher Mann."
languages.original_text: "Few things can be said about the oikonomos Nigmus. He has never been famous for his prowess in battle or his sermons, but the monastery has never wanted for anything on his watch. He is a most reasonable and unobtrusive individual."

traits.locale_text: "Über den Oikonomos Nigmus lässt sich nur wenig sagen. Er war nie für seine Kampfkraft oder für seine Predigten bekannt, doch es hat dem Kloster unter seiner Führung auch nie an irgendetwas gefehlt. Er ist ein äußerst vernünftiger und unaufdringlicher Mann."

languages.text: "Kâhya Nigmus hakkında söylenebilecek çok şey yok. Çatışmalarda da vaazlarında da becerikliliğinden söz ettirmiş birisi değildir. Ancak manastır, onun gözetimindeyken hiçbir şeye ihtiyaç duymamıştır. Aralarında en mantıklı ve mütevazı olan odur."
languages.original_text: "Few things can be said about the oikonomos Nigmus. He has never been famous for his prowess in battle or his sermons, but the monastery has never wanted for anything on his watch. He is a most reasonable and unobtrusive individual."
